How does the study aim to enhance the un: By identifying potential mutations that could lead to immune escape.
By sequencing the entire genome of SARS-CoV-2.
By comparing SARS-CoV-2 with other coronaviruses.
By focusing on the virus's transmission dynamics.
What is the primary focus of the study o: Identifying potential antigenic drift sites (PADS) within the receptor binding domain (RBD) and N-terminal domain (NTD).
Developing a new vaccine targeting the spike protein.
Studying the spike protein's role in viral replication.
Analyzing the spike protein's stability under different temperatures.
What is the significance of the continuo: It guides the design of nanobodies that target less mutable regions of the spike protein.
It helps in predicting the spike protein's three-dimensional structure.
It assists in identifying the most immunogenic regions of the spike protein.
It provides a method to increase the binding affinity of nanobodies.
